long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Santa Surfers is an endless racing game available as a Chrome extension. Players can also enjoy it for free on the our website.

If you want play more games please click on "Classroom 6x" and click on web version for play on our website https://classroom-6x.org. Thanks!
